body: Base Form biped; Primary Evolutions basic magic (daze or ray of frost), magic attacks, resistance (acid or cold); Secondary Evolutions damage reduction (good), flight, immunity (fire), major magic (invisibility, minor image, or scorching ray), minor magic (burning hands or detect good), see in darkness, spell resistance, ultimate magic (fireball, lightning bolt, or major image) or dimension door.
